sent.orig: The Samajwadi Party controls 39 members of parliament in the 543 lower house of parliament.
sent.trans: 印度社会党在由543人组成的议会下院占有39席。

sent.orig: But he says the action taken by the Iraqi parliament parliament is an a significant breakthrough.
sent.trans: 但他说伊拉克国会采取的行动是一个重要的突破。

sent.orig: But he says action taken by the Iraqi Parliament parliament is a significant breakthrough.
sent.trans: 但是他表示，这次伊拉克国会通过选举法是一个重大的突破。

sent.orig: There are people in the parliament specializing in talking to members of Parliament.
sent.trans: 在议会里有人专门与议员交谈。

sent.orig: The government is planning to introduce the bill at the next session of parliament.
sent.trans: 政府正计划在下一次会议期间介绍该议案。
